resources.string: This is a completely free 🎉app & will remain so forever 😎. It is a very humble request that you please rate ⭐this application positively on play store so it can reach more users & hold a good ratings🥇 on play store. For past 6 months Wallup took a real toll on the ratings & apparently no of users/downloads 😢. It will only take 1 min of your time but will mean a lot to me . Thank you 🤗
